document.full_text: syrian forces killed at least 12 people on saturday when they fired on mourners calling for the end of president bashar al-assad's rule at mass funerals of pro-democracy protesters shot a day earlier.
document.title: twelve killed in pro-democracy protests in syria
lines_and_colors: syrian forces killed at least 12 people on saturday when they fired on mourners calling for the end of president bashar al-assad's rule at mass funerals of pro-democracy protesters shot a day earlier.
